sec.title: BrightSky
sec.p: BrightSky is an innovative health care products and services company with a comprehensive, patient-centered approach to diabetes management. Revolutionary in scope, BrightSky’s mission is to empower patients toward self-management, help providers better help their patients, and reduce the overall cost of diabetes management.

For patients, an online community provides access to diabetes tracking tools, exercises, recipes, community forums, education, telephone access to diabetes educators, as well as home delivery of diabetes supplies and medications. In the near future, training programs and webinars that will help patients better understand and manage their disease will be available online.
For health care professionals, BrightSky provides diabetes support services to reinforce prescribed treatment as well as referrals to community-based programs for comprehensive DSME/T.
For more information, please contact BrightSky at 1-800-852-1652 ext. 2608 or visit us online at www.BrightSky.com.

sec.title: Clickfine Pen Needles
sec.p: Clickfine Pen Needles are made in Switzerland with a patented “click-on” technology that makes attaching a pen needle faster, easier, safer, and more reliable. With its unique click-on feature, plus a new ergonomic cap and refined grippers, it is especially beneficial for people with arthritis or other manual dexterity issues and those with vision impairment. An audible “click” lets you know that the pen needle is securely attached. Clickfine’s needle technology also has improved insulin flow for a smooth and comfortable injection. Together, all these features provide injection comfort and confidence. Clickfine pen needles come in three sizes for a custom fit and simply click on all major diabetes pens. They’re available in stores nationwide and online, sold under the Clickfine name, and co-branded under store brand names in pharmacies nationwide. For more information, visit myClickfine.com or call us toll free at 1-800-461-7448.

sec.title: The Embrace™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
sec.p: The Embrace Meter is built to make testing blood sugar easier for people living with diabetes. It provides dependable, accurate results while still easy to use. The large display and talking component allow individuals with diabetes to both see and hear their results. Rubber grips along the side of the meter make for a secure grip during the testing procedure.

sec.title: Sugar Medical Supply
sec.p: Sugar Medical Supply, the creator of fun, stylish diabetic supply bags, is excited to announce their new line of supply bags made exclusively for Omni Pod users. In partnership with Insulet, Sugar Medical Supply has created bags that are designed to carry the Omni Pod PDM and have a special pocket for extra “pods.” Fashionable easy-to-clean fabrics, padded construction, and secure elastic straps are key design features of Sugar Medical Supply’s assortment of diabetic supply bags. Their new line of bags will be available mid-June on their website www.sugarmedicalsupply.com; Sugar Medical Supply, LLC, Stratham, NH; 1-888-522-2545.

sec.title: UltiCare® Micro 4 mm × 32 G Pen Needle
sec.p: The new UltiCare® Micro 4 mm × 32 G pen needle is our shortest, thinnest pen needle, providing a more comfortable injection for patients living with diabetes. The Micro has all the comfort of the leading pen needle at a more affordable price and a less painful injection experience for the patient. The Micro is compatible with all pens sold in the US and is available in an easy to dispense 50-count box or 100-count UltiGuard® Safe Pack that combines pen needles and a sharps container all in one system.
